name: IMPROVE7
overview:
IMPROVE7 is a nonprofit organization that capitalizes on the power of social networking to create global change.

Compared to the LIVESTRONGâ„¢ bracelet (The yellow wristband sold by the Lance Armstrong Foundation to fund cancer research), IMPROVE7â„¢ is offering a visible way for members of social networking websites to showcase their support to worthy causes on the internet.

The IMPROVE7 Bangle is available through participatory social networking websites and can be showcased on social networking profiles as a symbol of commitment to improve the world.

The 7 represents all 7 continents as it is our goal to support funding for the most important causes around the globe. All proceeds from the IMPROVE7 Bangle are used to improve poverty, healthcare, education and the environment. IMPROVE7 funds innovative nonprofit organizations that are using creative solutions to solve long term global issues.

At IMPROVE7 we believe that the world can and should be bettered. A simple idea can change society. A simple gesture of heart can inspire others. An IMPROVE7 Bangle can improve the world. We urge you to do your part.
